function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative mental health effects of lockdown","Impact":"Increased anxiety and depression","Mitigation":"Improving access to blue/green spaces","Technologies":"Public and private recreational spaces","People":"Individuals in lockdown","Owner":"Health and government authorities"},{"Description":"Social inequality, housing inequalities, and health inequalities","Impact":"Inextricably bound health disparities","Mitigation":"Addressing social harm and structural nature of mental health inequalities","Technologies":"Housing design and policy","People":"Affected communities","Owner":"Policy makers, researchers"},{"Description":"Prolonged exposure to harmful homes as a mechanism for health inequalities","Impact":"Unclear causation of health disparities","Mitigation":"Further assessment of the impact of housing design and policy on mental health","Technologies":"Research and data analysis","People":"Research community, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
